website_summaries.verdict: This matte, gritty hair clay works well with longer, thicker hair.
cons: Can get washed out in the rain

customer_reviews.title: one of the worst heavy clays i have tried
customer_reviews.text: i really don't want to have to write a book here, but lets just say that this stuff is no good. no hold, no texture, and even though it's a clay.....this stuff got hard in my hair like i was using a gel. never seen anything like it with a clay. also, the fact that it's SUPPOSED to be a premium product and is expensive....it's just a slap in the face. never going to buy any "by vilain" product again.
customer_reviews.author: eric salamon

customer_reviews.title: Excellent as far as hair hold goes
customer_reviews.text: Hair hold isn't in my game really anymore... maybe it is... I dunno totally... My hair is a problem child. Was gonna say three stars, but this is actually five. Great hold, great smell. Chicks love it. Just a little bit though Larry, don't over do it, quaffing the hell out of that mop.
customer_reviews.author: timothy ingalls

customer_reviews.title: "Did anyone ever tell you you have really nice hair?"
customer_reviews.text: If you're uncomfortable with people constantly complimenting your hair or strangers molesting it, you may want to avoid this product. This is a must-have for longer hair. Vilain's dynamite clay nailed the texture and it holds up throughout the day. Keeps the hair soft to the touch as well so your girl (and strangers!) will want to run her hands through it. This is my second Vilain product I've purchased and am very happy Water soluble just like everything out there so be aware of the trade-off: Easy to wash out but if you, say, get stuck in the rain for even a split second, the hairdo is gone.
customer_reviews.author: Headache

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely great product. Matte finish
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely great product. Matte finish. Strong hold. As claimed by them. Gives your hear great texture and clumping, and you hair are re-workable even till the next day. My hair is thick, so it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Gurprataap Sandhu

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.text: “Professional” it says. Unfortunately it’s basic in my opinion.. for the price it is not worth it. Not to mention the meager amount that the product contains.
customer_reviews.author: Noe

customer_reviews.title: great stuff
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff! great finish to it with a great hold, easy to work with.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Good product for hair
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Not too heavy. It’s like cream will give a nice light shine but may need to use it with another product of you want to hold your hair in place.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible do not buy. Read review
customer_reviews.text: You have to use a lot of product for it to actually hold and within 30 it loses its hold and it literally gets greasy and feels horrible in hair. Worst hair product don’t buy
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Best hair product on the market and quick shipping!!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite hair product I’ve ever used. I’ve tried just about everything and by vilain is the only product that reaalllly works for my hair. It doesn’t melt in your hair in the heat or wear out throughout the day like everything else. Also I love how quick the shipping is!!!
customer_reviews.author: Collin_rausch

customer_reviews.title: 1/4 star
customer_reviews.text: There is no quarter star option to rate, I think it will be very generous. Very greasy, no hold and smell not that great and I can’t return it.
customer_reviews.author: Sudhakar Gaikwad

customer_reviews.title: Awesome scent
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works well. Smells like coffee and firm hold, nice consistancy , realy texturizes hair. It's a little too pastey for me which is why I'm giving it a four star review but good product over all highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: John Botelho

customer_reviews.title: Undeniable quality
customer_reviews.text: Just got this product today and couldn't be happier. The hold and matte finish is stunning. Not much of the product is used if applied correctly. Any negative reviews on this product come purely from a bias.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product for thick hair. I find it works a little better when my hair is damp.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product - volume - natural look - strong hold ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing Product - volume - natural look - strong hold So far the best hair produce I've used, I really recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Ramos

customer_reviews.title: This is by far the best hair product iv
customer_reviews.text: Has a strong hold but feels soft. This is by far the best hair product iv used
customer_reviews.author: chad

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: one of the best clays I have ever used, surely I will re-purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: Eman

customer_reviews.title: Vilan Dynamite Hair Pomade
customer_reviews.text: Probably the best pomade I've ever used in my life. Smells great and holds my hair in place very well. I would recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Ben S.

customer_reviews.title: I used it with damp and dry hair, messed ...
customer_reviews.text: I used it with damp and dry hair, messed around with it a couple times and the result came out to be to hard,
customer_reviews.author: Luis reagalado

customer_reviews.title: Perfect hair
customer_reviews.text: I have medium thick and wavy hair and this product holds my hair very well. The dynamite is also very flexible as I could move my hair around through out the day. I like to use it on wet hair and then blow dry with an additional touch up on dry hair. Every hair type is different and you will have to try different products until you find the one that will work. This one works well on my hair and I will continue to use it for the long run. I'm glad I've found this brand!
customer_reviews.author: Romeow

customer_reviews.title: It is dynamite. ;-)
customer_reviews.text: For matte finish, this hair styling wax is just perfect. Will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Raj Aurora

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff holds and doesn't make my blond hair feel or look greasy.
customer_reviews.author: LAAAAMB

customer_reviews.title: Good hold, I have thick hair and it stays ...
customer_reviews.text: Good hold, I have thick hair and it stays how I want it until it's washed out. Only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is because it leaves my hair a little sticky.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Nelson

customer_reviews.title: its hard as a rock and was not good for the hair at all
customer_reviews.text: This product is awful...its hard as a rock and was not good for the hair at all...I bought this wax after hearing good reviews about it...basically the problem is that you can't mold anything on your hair with it..waste of money if you ask me!
customer_reviews.author: Sajal

customer_reviews.title: No clay in this clay --Gets greasy fast too.
customer_reviews.text: It OK...it has a lot of petroleum jelly in in it. It also has NO bentonite in it. Bentonite IS clay. Most of the ingredients are waxes and petroleum jelly (NO clay). If you use too much--it gets greasy FAST.
customer_reviews.author: ts twain

product_meta.title: By Vilain Dynamite Professional Hair Styling Clay 2.2oz
product_meta.description: By Vilain Dynamite Clay is a hair clay wax with a strong hold and matte gritty finish. Lets you manipulate your hair into any style while adding fullness and texture. Great for any hair type, allows for re-workability.
